page.title: 08DORKING HIGH STREET - SHOPS
page.content: On the 12th July my friend and I surveyed Dorking Town High Street to find out how useful Dorking is to the average shopper.Our conclusions are as follows:- Dorking's High Street is very good for people who want Building Societies,Banks,Estate Agents and Men's clothes shops,as the majority of the shops consisted of these. Dorking has quite a good selection of food stores,like J.Sainsbury,Waitrose and Tesco's.There are also plenty of shoe shops and well known shops such as W.H.Smith and Woolworth.Department stores Littlewoods and Marks and Spencers are not present.
